name: Talisker 18 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Rich and fruity, with notes of dried fruit, vanilla, and spice.
flavorProfilePalate: Smooth and full-bodied, with hints of smoke, pepper, and caramel.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and warming, with a smoky and slightly sweet aftertaste.
awards: Best Single Malt Whisky - World Whiskies Awards 2020, Gold Medal - International Spirits Challenge 2019
tastingNotesAroma: Dried fruits, vanilla, and subtle smoke
tastingNotesTaste: Spicy, rich caramel with hints of citrus

name: Lagavulin 16 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Smoky, peaty, with hints of dried fruit and vanilla.
flavorProfilePalate: Rich and full-bodied, with deep smoke, caramel, and spice.
flavorProfileFinish: Long, smooth, and slightly sweet with a smoky aftertaste.
awards: Best Peated Whisky - Whisky Advocate 2021, Double Gold - San Francisco Spirits Competition 2020
tastingNotesAroma: Deep smoke, hints of vanilla and sherry
tastingNotesTaste: Rich caramel, spice, and peat smoke
tastingNotesFinish: Lingering warmth with a smooth smoke

name: Macallan 25 Year Old Sherry Oak
flavorProfileNose: Dried fruit, spice, and rich oak notes.
flavorProfilePalate: Silky smooth with a balanced mix of sherry sweetness and deep oak.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and luxurious with lingering sherry warmth.
awards: World’s Best Single Malt - Whisky Magazine 2020, Gold Medal - International Spirits Challenge 2021
tastingNotesAroma: Deep sherry, dried fruits, and spice
tastingNotesTaste: Rich caramel, dried fruit, and smooth vanilla
tastingNotesFinish: Long and sherried with a touch of oak spice

name: Glenlivet 21 Year Old Archive
flavorProfileNose: Rich dried fruit, oak, and subtle spice.
flavorProfilePalate: Smooth and deep, with sherry sweetness and complex spices.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and slightly dry, with hints of nutmeg and cinnamon.
awards: Best Speyside Whisky - Whisky Advocate 2019, Gold Medal - International Spirits Challenge 2021
tastingNotesTaste: Rich caramel, spice, and smooth vanilla
tastingNotesFinish: Lingering warmth with subtle sherry influence

name: Glenfiddich 21 Year Old Reserva Rum Cask
flavorProfileNose: Delicate floral notes with a hint of tropical fruit and vanilla.
flavorProfilePalate: Rich and smooth, with notes of honey, fruitcake, and oak.
flavorProfileFinish: Long, smooth, and slightly spicy with a hint of oak.
awards: Best Single Malt Whisky - International Spirits Challenge 2020
tastingNotesAroma: Tropical fruit, vanilla, and a touch of oak
tastingNotesTaste: Honey, dried fruit, and a dash of spice
tastingNotesFinish: Smooth with a warm, oak finish

name: Ardbeg 10 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Intense smoke, citrus, and vanilla.
flavorProfilePalate: Bold and peaty with hints of lemon and black pepper.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and smoky with a touch of sweetness.
awards: Best Islay Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2021

name: Highland Park 18 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Heather honey, dried fruit, and a hint of smoke.
flavorProfilePalate: Rich and full-bodied with notes of toffee, spice, and smoke.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and balanced with a smoky sweetness.
awards: Best Single Malt - International Spirits Challenge 2021

name: Oban 14 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Rich and smoky with hints of sea salt and citrus.
flavorProfilePalate: Smooth and full-bodied with notes of honey, fruit, and smoke.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and slightly sweet with a smoky aftertaste.
awards: Gold Medal - San Francisco Spirits Competition 2020

name: Laphroaig 10 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Intense peat smoke, medicinal, and seaweed.
flavorProfilePalate: Bold and smoky with hints of vanilla and oak.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and peaty with a touch of sweetness.
awards: Best Islay Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2020

name: Glenmorangie 18 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Rich and floral with hints of honey and dried fruit.
flavorProfilePalate: Smooth and creamy with notes of toffee, vanilla, and spice.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and balanced with a touch of oak.
awards: Gold Medal - International Spirits Challenge 2021

name: Balvenie 21 Year Old PortWood
flavorProfileNose: Rich and fruity with hints of port and oak.
flavorProfilePalate: Smooth and complex with notes of honey, fruit, and spice.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and warming with a touch of sweetness.
awards: Best Speyside Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2021

name: Springbank 15 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Rich and smoky with hints of sherry and oak.
flavorProfilePalate: Full-bodied and complex with notes of fruit, spice, and smoke.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and balanced with a smoky sweetness.
awards: Best Campbeltown Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2021

name: GlenDronach 18 Year Old Allardice
flavorProfileNose: Rich and sherried with hints of dark chocolate and spice.
flavorProfilePalate: Smooth and full-bodied with notes of fruitcake, oak, and spice.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and warming with a sherry sweetness.
awards: Best Highland Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2021

name: Glenfarclas 25 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Rich and complex with hints of sherry, oak, and spice.
flavorProfilePalate: Smooth and full-bodied with notes of fruit, toffee, and spice.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and warming with a sherry sweetness.
awards: Best Speyside Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2020

name: Bruichladdich The Classic Laddie
flavorProfileNose: Fresh and floral with hints of citrus and oak.
flavorProfilePalate: Smooth and creamy with notes of vanilla, fruit, and spice.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and balanced with a touch of sweetness.
awards: Best Islay Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2021

name: Yamazaki 12 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Honey, dried fruit, and a hint of spice.
flavorProfilePalate: Smooth and well-balanced with notes of fruit, oak, and vanilla.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and slightly sweet with a touch of oak.
awards: Best Japanese Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2021

name: Hakushu 12 Year Old
flavorProfileNose: Fresh and herbal with hints of smoke and citrus.
flavorProfilePalate: Light and crisp with notes of green apple, mint, and smoke.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and refreshing with a touch of smoke.
awards: Best Japanese Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2020

name: Nikka Yoichi Single Malt
flavorProfileNose: Rich and peaty with hints of fruit and spice.
flavorProfilePalate: Bold and smoky with notes of oak, fruit, and spice.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and warming with a smoky sweetness.
awards: Best Japanese Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2019

name: Kavalan Solist Vinho Barrique
flavorProfileNose: Rich and fruity with hints of vanilla and oak.
flavorProfilePalate: Full-bodied and complex with notes of tropical fruit, vanilla, and spice.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and warming with a touch of sweetness.
awards: Best Taiwanese Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2021

name: Amrut Fusion
flavorProfileNose: Rich and smoky with hints of fruit and spice.
flavorProfilePalate: Bold and complex with notes of oak, fruit, and spice.
flavorProfileFinish: Long and warming with a smoky sweetness.
awards: Best Indian Single Malt - World Whiskies Awards 2021
